divs: sighting detailstraveling west on miami county road 500 s. as i approached ind state rd 19 i noticed an orange ball-like light to the west at around 20-25 degrees elevation and maybe 3-5 degrees to the south of my position. i at first thought it was really big for a star. i then thought maybe it was an aircraft from grissom arb. both thoughts were negated as it wasn't twinkling or strobing. after viewing for 4-5 seconds or more the orange object faded out. another 4-5 seconds passed and the orange object turned back on for maybe another good 5 seconds at which time it faded back out not to reappear. this object was low in the sky and not very far to my front. this all transpired in less than a mile from the intersection of 500 s\in 19 and 500s\250 e. it was no flares or grissom kc135s. the object was also traveling west.
